remarks: Right identity property of an identity arrow.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catidcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catidcl.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
catidcl.i $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
catidcl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
catidcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
catlid.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
catlid.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
catlid.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
catrid $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( <. X , X >. .x. Y ) ( .1. ` X ) ) = F ) $.
